Adrien Joyce) and Bob Rafelson, and directed by Rafelson. The film stars Jack 
Nicholson, with Karen Black, Susan Anspach, Ralph Waite, and Sally Struthers in 
supporting roles. The film tells the story of a surly oil rig worker, Bobby Dupea, 
whose...
